CustomField.description: [GG]This field shows the approval levl as flags
CustomField.formula: IF(Approval_Level__c =0, IMAGE("/img/samples/flag_green.gif", "0"), IF(Approval_Level__c >= 1, IMAGE("/img/samples/flag_red.gif", "1"),'')&' '& IF(Approval_Level__c >= 2, IMAGE("/img/samples/flag_red.gif", "2"),'')& ' '& IF(Approval_Level__c >= 3, IMAGE("/img/samples/flag_red.gif", "3"),''))
CustomField.label: Commercial Approval Level Indicator
